## The Penguins Package

```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
palmerpenguins::penguins

```

First some basic summary of the data.

```{r}
summary(penguins)
nrow(penguins)
ncol(penguins)
```

Next I'll try out some of the other functions that are in the progdata website.

```{r}
head(penguins)
tail(penguins)
str(penguins)
row.names(penguins)
names(penguins)


```
